intro.description: This tutorial explains how to import data files to start NCD data reduction.

item.title: Open Data Project wizard
item.description: We need to open "Data Project" wizard to import data into DAWN.

subitem.label: On the DAWN Welcome screen select "NCD Data Reduction" perspective.
Locate "Project Explorer" view on the active perspective.
Select the view and right-click on it to open pop-up menu.
Select New > Projects... menu and open Data > Data Project to start the wizard.

item.title: Create new Data Project
item.description: Data project creates new project in the Project Explorer view with a link to a specified data directory.

subitem.label: Specify project name in Project field.
Give the folder name in Folder field.
Specify location of the top-level directory with the data in the Directory field or select it from directory dialog using Browse.. button.
Press Finish button to create a Data Project.

item.title: Browse data in Project Explorer
item.description: New project is added into Project Explorer view. It contains folder that links to the top-level directory specified in the wizard.
